product.title: Windsor White - Roman Blind
product.description: Pure and simple, the windsor white is the colour of snow, and adds a cool and refreshing vibe to the home without compromising on class or elegance. This light and pretty shade forms a beautiful roman blind, strengthened in appearance by the shimmering sheen of the silk-like fabric. The white can be paired with any colour combination you choose. It will look particularly attractive against a petrol blue shade to craft a contemporary nautical look in the bathroom.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Frost Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Stockholmfrost is an attractive, clean and crisp white colour. It will freshen up any space within the home or office. Stockholm frost fabric is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. Their roller blinds come with various control options, including a spring pull acorn which removes the need for any cords making them inherently child safe. As with all their made to measure products this blind comes with a 5 year guarantee giving extra peace of mind when investing in this product.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Snow White Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Stockholm snow is a beautiful fresh white colour, it will work perfectly in most spaces. A real all rounder & great for brightening up any room. Stockholm snow fabric is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. As with all their made to measure products this blind comes with a 5 year guarantee which covers all parts of the blind. relproducts.description: Oslo is a beautiful range of blinds with a good selection of colours. The blackout feature makes it perfect for those who want to create darkness in the room at any time. relproducts.title: Rimini White - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: The rimini in white is a soft, fresh shade, perfect for adding light and air to any room it's placed in. Its pale colour and lightweight fabric mean that the room doesn't have to be dark every time you need a little privacy. Brighten up even the gloomiest of rooms by placing this blind in the window; it's ideal for small utility rooms or bathrooms. Alternatively, surround with pretty florals or bold bright shades in the bedroom or living room.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Paper White Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Stockholm paper is a light, off white colour. It will brighten up any room wonderfully, there is nothing fresher or more clean looking than white when dressing a window. Their stockholm paper fabric is also moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. As with all their made to measure products this blind comes with a 5 year guarantee which covers all parts of the blind ensuring you are purchasing a product that wwill stand the test of time.

relproducts.title: Oslo Blackout Paper White Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Their best-selling oslo blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home. This soft paper white roller blind adds bold and vibrant enhancment to your room and is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure roller blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control.

relproducts.title: Stirlo Porcelain White
relproducts.description: Stirloporcelain whiteplain roller blind the stirlo range boast a fantastic range of dim-out privacy fabrics to compliment any room. The fabric is composed of 100% polyester and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with white chain used as standard, or a nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade. Supplied with the blinds are installation instructions and universal brackets suitable for top, side and face fixing.

relproducts.title: Windsor Mist Grey Roman Blind
relproducts.description: The windsor mist grey roman blind provides a sophisticated way to style your windows with the practical benefits of a sleek and compact folding design. Marrying a silky feel fabric in a gentle grey hue with a glittering flowing pattern, this modern motif is sure to sparkle. This warm grey blind is a versatile choice that will team well with a range colours such as beige, gold, navy blue or lime green.

relproducts.title: Windsor Petal Pink Roman Blind
relproducts.description: Sleek and minimalist with a touch of sparkle, the windsor petal pink roman blind is a glamorous option for light control within your home and will suit a range of settings. Reflective, metallic yarns pick out an alluring pattern upon a silky feel, soft pink backdrop that will give your space a subtle touch of decorative pattern. Product id: db-rom1071 fabric colour: petal pink material: 41% cotton 36% polyester 23% viscose lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets.

relproducts.title: Windsor Canvas Roman Blind
relproducts.description: Made from silky-feel, neutral toned fabric and beautifully enriched with strands of metallic yarn, this window blind will make a simple yet sophisticated update for your decor. The windsor canvas roman blind features a lustrous and sparkling finish that is given further richness by the visual effect of the smooth curving pattern. Product id: db-rom1073 fabric colour: canvas material: 41% cotton 36% polyester 23% viscose lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets.

relproducts.title: Windsor Raspberry - Roman Blind
relproducts.description: In deep, pinky red, with the silky feel of deluxe satin, the windsor raspberry is a classic choice, adding plush homeliness and cosy luxury wherever it hangs. If ever there were a fabric made for the curves of the roman blind, this is the one. Try using the raspberry in a neutral cream or magnolia hallway to add a burst of colour to an often overlooked area of the home that can be much in need of a stylish lift.

relproducts.title: Windsor Taupe - Roman Blind
relproducts.description: In soft, subtle mocha brown, the windsor taupe is an elegant and sophisticated blind, combining a silky and satiny sheen to complement its pretty colour. Gently raised ribbing provides this otherwise sleek fabric with depth and texture, adding a characterful feel to the blind. The taupe will work beautifully as a delicate neutral to temper bolder colours. Try it with a wine and cream colour scheme, opted for a boldly printed wallpaper and rich, dark floors.

relproducts.title: Windsor Red - Roman Blind
relproducts.description: Vivid and vibrant, the windsor red simply refuses to be missed. Its bold colour suits the soft sheen of the silk-like fabric perfectly, and the cloth is a lightweight yet highly durable one, backed with polycotton sateen lining for long-lasting protection. The red is one for the glamorous, so do it justice by pairing with rich golds for a strikingly eye-catching look that will make your home one of contemporary class.

relproducts.title: Windsor Sandstone - Roman Blind
relproducts.description: A gently shimmering pale gold, emphasised by the satin-feel fabric, the windsor sandstone is a blind of class and elegance. The silky cloth works wonderfully as a roman blind, easily falling into folds, and complementing the gentle curves. Craft a look of understated glamour in your living room by grouping the sandstone with cream walls and soft furnishings, wood-look tongue and groove flooring, and brushed gold oddments and accessories.

relproducts.title: Windsor Black - Roman Blind
relproducts.description: There's no black more striking than one with a deep, shimmering sheen, and that's what you get with the windsor in black. Raised ribbing catches the light further, increasing the feeling of texture and character to the blind. Use the black in a contemporary setting, teaming it with a boldly patterned wallpaper in shimmering silvers. Pick a sumptuous purple or a luxe forest green to use as your accents, placing them throughout the room in the form of cushions, lamps, and ornaments.

relproducts.title: Windsor Ivory - Roman Blind
relproducts.description: A sweet and sumptuous blind, mixing contrasting feelings of purity and grandeur, the windsor ivory incorporates pale, luxurious white and blends it with a silky smooth, lightweight fabric, all falling together into the gentle curves of the roman style. Keep your bedroom light and airy, with a touch of luxe, by hanging the ivory amongst pale pink or mint green walls, and accenting throughout the room with a darker version of your chosen colour.

relproducts.title: Lumiere Unlined Bijou Linen Grey Wash Roman Blind
relproducts.description: Bring your interiors together with ease with the lovely lumiere bijou linen grey wash roman blind. Its the perfect, modern neutral and can be easily styled with a range of rooms, from the bright and bold to monochrome schemes.
